segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, she looks so focused.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water overflowing from the sink, it's creating a big puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the floor must be really slippery by now, someone could fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy on the stool, he's really reaching for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl waiting patiently, she looks so hopeful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why the woman hasn't noticed the water yet, it's right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the stool is going to tip over, the boy could get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the garden outside, it looks so calm and tidy compared to the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water streaming down the cabinets, it's making everything wet.
segments.speaker: PAR
